PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-05702009-04-23,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of HAROLD BJARNASON of Gimli, Manitoba, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Robert W. Mantha.
AttachmentsAttachment
